CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This new polymer , referred to as PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , is designed to fulfill the abovementioned requirements simultaneously as much as possible.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP: This is a specific type or name of the polymer.
2. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu): This is a compound name, where PDTP is the main polymer and DTDPP(Bu) is a modifier or additive to the polymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PDTP
2. DTDPP(Bu) (as it is a material additive or modifier)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This new polymer , referred to as PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , is designed to fulfill the abovementioned requirements simultaneously as much as possible.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP: This is a specific type or name of the polymer.
2. DTDPP(Bu): This is another specific type or name of the polymer, with the suffix (Bu) likely indicating a particular variant or modification.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PDTP: This polymer
2. DTDPP(Bu): This polymer (specific variant or modification)

These entities are relevant as they are the specific materials or polymers being referred to in the paragraph, and material properties are an essential aspect of polymers and other materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: This new polymer , referred to as PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , is designed to fulfill the abovementioned requirements simultaneously as much as possible.

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - This is a specific type of polymer being referred to in the paragraph.
2. DTDPP(Bu) - This is another specific type of polymer mentioned in the paragraph, which is a part of the name of the new polymer (PDTP).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PDTP - This polymer has the required material properties.
2. DTDPP(Bu) - This polymer also has the required material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PDTP (polymer) |
| DTDPP(Bu) (polymer) |

These polymers have the required material properties.
